public method Authen::WeBWorK::HTTPBasic::get_credentials (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in get_credentials: 18
sub get_credentials {
    my ($self) = @_;
    my $r = $self->{r};
    
    my ($res, $sent_pw) = $r->get_basic_auth_pw;
    #return unless $res == OK;
    return unless $res == Apache2::Const::OK;
    my $user_id = $r->user;
    #my $user_id = $r->connection->user;
    
    #if (defined $r->connection->user) {
    if (defined $r->user) {
        $self->{user_id} = $r->user;
        $self->{password} = $sent_pw;
        $self->{credential_source} = "http_basic";
        return 1;
    }
}
